ing: 1/4 cup ice cubes, or as needed
des: "This is my go-to cocktail recipe, ready in just a few minutes! Feel free to experiment with the flavors. You can use vodka or coconut rum or you can add peach schnapps; it is entirely up to your tastes."
ins: Combine rum, passion fruit juice, mango juice, lime juice, grenadine, and nutmeg in a cocktail shaker; cover and shake. Fill a glass with ice; pour cocktail over ice.
